snippet.title: ZombieRun Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Official website: http://zombierun.eu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/zombierungame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheZombieRunGame

Platform: PC / Mac / Linux
Stores: itch.io, indiegamestand.com, desura.com
Release date: 29th October 2014
Genre: Multiplayer retro zombie platformer

Description:
ZombieRun is retro platformer with the aim to bring sexy back to local multiplayer gaming. 

ZombieRun features classical weapons, gang of living dead and superpowers. Yes, you have SUPERPOWERS. So get your cape on and start saving the world. ZombieRun has addictive single player mode and awesome local multiplayer games. Up to 4 players can play at the same time in either single screen co-op mode, where you have to work together as one or split screen competitive mode, where everyone's fighting for themselves. And also there's the Battle mode where players can blast at each other with what they've got.
Short video about awesome ZombieRun Multiplayer modes.

ZombieRun has controller support so get your joypads out.

ZombieRun is developed by Indrek Vändrik.

Sounds used in the trailer:

Forest sound:
https://www.freesound.org/people/Motion_S/sounds/221758/

Background music: Alex Beroza - Drive
http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/AlexBeroza/43098
